item.description:
Weather willing - that's no snow or ice at ANY temperature! Started by our very own hardcore scooterist Doug Alden. We will start with a cup of hot cocoa at Finale in brookline and the head south & west through Brookline and neighboring towns in search of a nice ride and a place for lunch. All secondary roads, an easy scoot on a cool day.

Found a great Greek restaurant on yelp in Dedham, hope they are open tomorrow. Their gyros are supposed to be great! http://www.yelp.com/biz/kouzina-estiatorio-dedham Bikes in storage? Bring the cage!
item.name: New years day ride
